name: Get Out (itch) (Bentot)
description:
This is a short 1-minute game created during the OneMinute GameJam but didn't finish in time.  It's about a miner that's inside a mineshaft that's being demolished or blown up.  You need to escape before getting crushed by its very walls.  Can you do it before the time runs out?

A or Left Arrow Key - Move Left
D or Right Arrow Key - Move Right
S or Down Arrow Key - Go Down
Space - Jump

CREDITS:

Bentot - Art, Programming, and Game Design

NitroAnilin - Music

SadCookie - Sound Effects
